meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vinblastine to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: She received vinblastine as part of her cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The vinblastine in the medicine made the cancer cells run away like scared mice.
meanings.sent4: His body became a battlefield where vinblastine fought bravely against the cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: The vinblastine was like a superhero swooping in to save the day from the evil cancer villains.

meanings.definition: The active ingredient in the medication vinblastine sulfate.
meanings.sent1: Vinblastine is the key component in the medication that fights cancer.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained the importance of vinblastine sulfate in the treatment.
meanings.sent3: The vinblastine in the formula danced around happily, knowing it was the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against cancer, vinblastine stood out as the fearless leader.
meanings.sent5: The vinblastine sulfate worked tirelessly to defeat the cancer cells, never giving up the fight.
